title: White Liar
alternative_title: White Liar ; ホワイトライアー
status: White Liar ; ホワイトライアー
description:
Description :
        Twenty-eight-year-old Shiraishi Kei has tasted both the sweets and sours of love and has since vowed never to fall in love again. As a freelance beautician, he is designated by upcoming actor, Jinnouchi Taiga, who was in need of a hairdresser. Taiga, who initially had a mysterious and standoffish air around him, completely changed in Kei’s hands. What was supposed to just be another appointment ended with them going out for a meal and…

“Are you looking for someone to have some fun with?”

See how the line between lies and sincerity is blurred in this Showbiz BL starring a younger chameleon actor and a hairdresser who is skeptical about love.
